    • Constructor Detail

      • Dataset

        public Dataset(java.lang.String abspath,
               java.lang.String data_map)
        Preparing test data
        Parameters:
        abspath: - the path from which you want to read the dataset
        data_map: - a CSV tuple of the semantics of each column in the CoNLL training data.

      • Dataset

        public Dataset(java.lang.String abspath,
               java.lang.String data_map,
               int size)
        This is for testing to have a subset of the data only
        Parameters:
        abspath: - the path from which you want to read the dataset
        data_map: - a CSV tuple of the semantics of each column in the CoNLL training data.
        size: - the size of the pool of sentences

                                       boolean raw)
        Returns the textual content of a CoNLL annotated dataset as raw or CoNLL formatted text
        Parameters:
        absPath: - the path from which you want to read the dataset
        raw: - boolean value to choose between returning a raw or CoNLL formatted string
